alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 2:47AM MST until January 22 at 9:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of mostly up to one inch, but up to 3 inches in the Sweet Grass Hills. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause blowing snow. * WHERE...The Interstate 15 Corridor north of Power, Eastern Toole and Liberty, and Hill County. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will brief periods of reduced visibility in blowing snow.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County
